mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, pass, name, age, gender, joinDate, enable, profile) values(#{userId}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, sysdate, 1, #{profile})
mapper.select: select r.rseq rseq, c.t title, to_char(r.logtime,'yyyy-mm-dd') logtime, r.subject subject, r.savefolder imgdir1, r.savepicture imgdir2 from review r, (select title t, contentsid ci, catname cn from contents c, contentscate ct where c.catcode = ct.catcode) c where r.contentsid = c.ci and r.userid= #{userId} and c.cn = #{category} order by r.logtime desc
